class Interface.UI.Error.Error[source]

Bases: object

CLass containing methods related to widget with error message.

clicked()[source]

Method that closes the widget when the button is clicked.

retranslateUi(Dialog)[source]

Method called to set the proper text in objects of widget.

setupUi(Dialog)[source]

Method called to build the widget with error message. This method also handles the button click event.

class Interface.UI.Fractals_Mainwindow.Ui_MainWindow[source]

Bases: object

CLass containing methods related to main window of application.

clicked()[source]

Method called to display the widget with input options for Mandelbrot set.

clicked_2()[source]

Method called to display the widget with input options for Julia set.

retranslateUi(MainWindow)[source]

Method called to set the proper text in objects of widget.

setupUi(MainWindow)[source]

Method called to build the main window. This method also handles the buttons click event.

Interface.UI.Input module

Form implementation generated from reading ui file ‘Input.ui’

Created by: PyQt6 UI code generator 6.5.2

WARNING: Any manual changes made to this file will be lost when pyuic6 is run again. Do not edit this file unless you know what you are doing.

class Interface.UI.Input.Ui_Dialog[source]

Bases: object

CLass containing methods related to widget with input options of application. It also contains the objects of classes Model, Julia and Mandelbrot.

J = True
Julia = <Fractals.Julia.Julia object>
M = <Fractals.Model.Model object>
Mandelbrot = <Fractals.Mandelbrot.Mandelbrot object>
clicked()[source]

Method that sets the variables and calls the proper draw() method when the button is clicked. If the values are not correct, it displays the widget with error.

retranslateUi(Dialog)[source]

Method called to set the proper text in objects of widget. Some texts depend on which fractal is chosen to be generated.

setupUi(Dialog, J)[source]

Method called to build the widget with input options. This method also handles the button click event.
